resources.string: By creating your account, you agree to our

PregnancyForAll Application is a mobile application that provides useful information about pregancy. However, some information may not suit you perfectly depends on who the person is. Please take a moment to read these Terms of Service, which represent a binding Agreement between you and PregnancyForAll. 1. PregnancyForAll does not provide medical advice 2. Use good judgment when applying the information provided 3. You need to sign up in order to use this application 4. Posts may not be deleted once you add it so be careful when posting something 5. Finally, the information is based on the following websites: http://www.modernmom.com/ http://www.cpmc.org/
